scripts.build:_ln: cat package.json | jq -r '{name} + {version, type, typings, main: "./index.js"}' > build/package.json
scripts.build: cat package.json | jq -r '.scripts | keys_unsorted[] | select(. | startswith("build:"))' | xargs -d \\n -I {} $npm_execpath run {}
scripts.clean: rm -rf build node_modules lib/nodegui lib/ng pnpm* .pnpm* package-lock.json yarn.lock
scripts.all: $npm_execpath clean && $npm_execpath install && $npm_execpath install:nodegui && $npm_execpath build && $npm_execpath install && $npm_execpath start
